soen6441.kingdoms.core
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  soen6441.kingdoms.core.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class represents the player with its id, the value of coins that he has, its initial tile, the set of castles he gets.
